thread.title: Laughter is the name of the game with Seann Walsh live at The Deck this summer
thread.title_full: Laughter is the name of the game with Seann Walsh live at The Deck this summer

author: mich@girlracer.me.uk (Michelle Chenery)
title: Laughter is the name of the game with Seann Walsh live at The Deck this summer
text:
Laughter is the name of the game with Seann Walsh live at The Deck this summer Laughter is the name of the game with Seann Walsh live at The Deck this summer Details Category: Venues & Events   12:30 At The Deck at the National Theatre the events team has the perfect antidote to those pesky deadlines and day-to-day stresses: a week of fresh, British comedy talent in a series of pop-up events this August. Opening to the public for one week only, from Monday 24 to Saturday 29 August, the exclusive rooftop venue, situated above the National Theatre, is serving up an incredible selection of some of the most talked about British comics of the moment. 
Each evening of entertainment will feature a key theme to unite the acts including: LGBT night, with performances from Zoe Lyons and David Morgan, and an All-Star night which also offers a signer for deaf and hard-of-hearing people. The line-up showcases a true spectrum of talent – a testament to the wealth of comedy genius on the British scene. The Deck can exclusively reveal that Play to the Whistle’s Seann Walsh is confirmed to appear on Thursday 27 August, with many more confirmed acts to be announced. Tickets go on sale on Tuesday 7 July and, with a limited number per performance, are set to sell out quickly. The price for performances between Monday 24 and Wednesday 26 August is £30pp and for performances on Thursday 27, Friday 28 and Saturday 29 August, tickets are £40pp. Performances start at 7pm and tickets include up to three hours of comedic entertainment plus a welcome drink and a box of nachos.
